message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something we can work with?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I can do $140, and that's as low as I can go.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Is that something we can agree on?
I can see you're serious about the product, but I'm not willing to go below $145. That's my final offer.
I'm really interested in the product, but $145 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $135, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're making a serious effort to find a deal, but I'm not willing to go below $150. That's my bottom line.
